thread.title: BRIEF-Pure Storage Reports Qtrly Adj Shr Loss $0.07

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Pure Storage Reports Qtrly Adj Shr Loss $0.07
text:
May 21 (Reuters) - Pure Storage Inc:
* PURE STORAGE ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER FISCAL 2019 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.29 * QTRLY NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.07
* Q1 REVENUE $255.9 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $251.5 MILLION
* SEES Q2 2019 REVENUE $296 MILLION TO $304 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.12, REVENUE VIEW $251.5 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2019 REVENUE VIEW $1.35 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 REVENUE VIEW $298.9 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
